flawed_nl_solution:
Four of the five figures are worth 4 * 15 = $<<4*15=60>>60.
With one more expensive figure, they are all worth 60 + 20 = $<<60+20=50>>50.
On all action figures, Jimmy will lose 5 * 5 = $<<5*5=25>>25 if he sells them cheaper.
So if Jimmy sells the figures he will get 50 - 25 = $<<50-25=25>>25.
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
